description: Checks if more than one Super Admin account exists in the IAM service
Checks if the number of Super Admin accounts is not more than 4
Checks if super admin accounts are used only for super admin activities
Checks if Google Workspace's external directory sharing is configured to prevent unrestricted directory data access
Checks if external sharing options for primary calendars are configured
Checks if the internal sharing options for primary calendars are properly configured
Checks if Google Calendar is configured to warn users when inviting guests outside the domain
Checks if external sharing options for secondary calendars are configured
Checks if internal sharing options for secondary calendars are properly configured
Checks if offline access to Google Calendar web is disabled
Checks if users are warned when they share a file outside their domain
Checks if public access is restricted for all storage buckets
Checks if document sharing in Google Drive is controlled by domain with allowlists
Warns the user when they try to share a file and/or shared drive with users in an allowlisted domain
Checks if Access Checker is configured to limit file access
Checks if the distribution of shared content to external organizations is restricted to users within the organization
Checks if users have the ability to create new shared drives
Checks if manager access members are restricted from modifying shared drive settings
Checks if shared drive file access is restricted to members only
Checks if the ability for viewers and commenters to download, print, and copy shared files is disabled
Checks if offline access to Google Drive documents is disabled
Checks if desktop access to Google Drive is disabled
Checks if Google Docs add-ons are disabled for users outside the organization
Checks if users cannot delegate access to their mailbox
Checks if offline access to Gmail is disabled for all users
Checks if DKIM is enabled for all mail enabled domains
Checks if SPF record is configured for all mail enabled domains in Google Workspace
Checks if a DMARC record is configured for all email domains in Google Workspace
Checks if quarantine admin notifications are enabled for Gmail
gcp_api_example: gcloud alpha scc settings services-gmail settings get --organization=ORGANIZATION_ID

description: Checks if protection against encrypted attachments from untrusted senders is enabled in Google Workspace Mail settings
Checks if protection against attachments with scripts from untrusted senders is enabled in Google Workspace
Checks if protection against anomalous attachment types in emails is enabled in Google Workspace
Checks if link identification behind shortened URLs is enabled
Checks if the scanning of linked images for malicious content is enabled
Checks if a warning prompt is displayed when a user clicks on links to untrusted domains
gcp_api_example: No direct GCP API available for this check

description: Checks if protection against domain spoofing based on similar domain names is enabled
Checks if protection against spoofing of employee names is enabled in Gmail settings
gcp_api_example: gcloud alpha scc settings services-gmail settings get --organization=ORGANIZATION_ID

description: Checks if protection against inbound emails spoofing your domain is enabled
Checks if protection against unauthenticated emails (SPF or DKIM) is enabled
gcp_api_example: gcloud alpha scc settings services-gmail settings describe --organization=ORGANIZATION_ID

description: Checks if groups are protected from inbound emails spoofing your domain by ensuring such emails are sent to the spam folder
Checks if POP and IMAP access is disabled for all Gmail users
gcp_api_example: gcloud alpha identity groups settings get-pop-settings --group-key=GROUP_KEY

description: Checks if automatic forwarding is disabled for Gmail users
gcp_api_example: gcloud alpha identity settings --user=user@example.com get auto-forwarding

description: Checks if per-user outbound gateways are disabled in Google Workspace
Checks if warnings for external recipients are enabled in Gmail
gcp_api_example: gcloud alpha scc settings services-gmail settings get --organization=ORGANIZATION_ID

description: Checks if enhanced pre-delivery message scanning is enabled in Gmail
gcp_api_example: gcloud alpha scc settings services-gmail settings describe --organization=ORGANIZATION_ID

description: Checks if spam filters are not bypassed for internal senders in Gmail settings
gcp_api_example: gcloud alpha scc settings services-gmail settings describe --organization=ORGANIZATION_ID

description: Checks if comprehensive mail storage is enabled in Gmail settings
gcp_api_example: gcloud alpha scc settings services-gmail settings describe --organization=ORGANIZATION_ID

description: Checks if Gmail is configured to send messages over a secure TLS connection
gcp_api_example: gcloud alpha scc settings services-gmail settings describe --organization=ORGANIZATION_ID

description: Checks if external filesharing in Google Chat and Hangouts is disabled
Checks if internal filesharing in Google Chat and Hangouts is disabled
Checks if Google Chat is restricted to allowed external domains
Checks if external spaces in Google Chat and Hangouts are restricted
Checks if the installation of Chat apps is disabled for users
Checks if the setting to allow users to add and use incoming webhooks is disabled
Checks if the IAM groups in the organization are set to private for external access
Checks if the creation of groups is restricted in the organization
Checks if groups in the organization can have external members
Checks if the default permission to view group conversations is restricted to group members only
Checks if the service status for Google Sites is set to off
Checks if access to external Google Groups is restricted for all users in the Google Workspace account
Checks if users access to Google Workspace Marketplace apps is restricted
Checks if hardware security keys are enforced for all IAM users
Checks if Super Admin account recovery is disabled
Checks if User account recovery is enabled for non-Super Admin users
Checks if Google Workspace is configured to verify a user's identity post-single sign on (SSO)
Checks if access to Workspace services, including Google Cloud Platform services such as Machine Learning, is restricted
Weekly review of connected third-party applications for potential malicious or unintended access or connections
Checks if Google Workspace APIs are accessible by customer-owned/developed applications
Weekly review of domain-wide delegations for applications for potentially malicious or unintended access or connections
Checks if access to Google applications is restricted by geographic location
Checks if Data Loss Prevention (DLP) policies for Google Drive are configured
gcp_api_example: gcloud dlp data-stores inspect templates list --project=PROJECT_ID

description: Checks if Google Workspace's session control is configured to strengthen session expiration
Checks if Google Cloud session control is configured to strengthen session expiration
Checks if less secure app access is disabled in Google Workspace
Checks if the security dashboard is reviewed regularly for anomalies
Checks if the App Usage Report in Google Workspace is reviewed regularly for anomalies
Checks if an alert is configured to be generated when a user's password is changed
Checks if alerts for government-backed attacks are configured
gcp_api_example: gcloud alpha scc settings services-enablement describe --organization=ORGANIZATION_ID

description: Checks if an alert is configured to be generated when a user's account is suspended due to suspicious activity
gcp_api_example: gcloud alpha scc settings services-enablement describe --organization=ORGANIZATION_ID

description: Checks if an alert is configured to be generated when a user is granted admin privilege
Checks if an alert is configured to be generated when Google detects suspicious login attempts from applications or computer programs.
Checks if an alert is configured for suspicious login attempts for IAM users
Checks if an alert is configured to be generated when Google detects compromised credentials requiring a reset of a user's password

Checks if an alert is configured to be generated when Google detects incoming messages are received where a sender’s name is in your Google Workspace directory, but the mail is not from the actual employee.
gcp_api_example: gcloud alpha scc settings services gmail settings get --organization=ORGANIZATION_ID
